security_audit.summary: Legitimate content processing workflow tool. Static findings are false positives - patterns detected (network calls, credential access, file operations) are standard functionality for content scraping and AI rewriting tool. No malicious intent, no data exfiltration, no credential theft.

content.user_title: Generate viral posts from article lists
content.value_statement: Convert article collections into viral content using AI. This tool automatically scrapes article text and applies proven viral writing frameworks.
actual_capabilities: Parse markdown files containing article links in [title](url) format
Fetch and extract article content using Readability parser
Generate viral content using Defou x Stanley AI framework
Automatically trigger verification workflow on generated content
limitations: Requires valid Anthropic API key for content generation
Only processes links starting with http/https protocols
Article content limited to 15000 characters per article
Does not bypass paywalls or access-restricted content

best_practices: Use clear [Title](Link) format in markdown for reliable parsing
Keep article titles under 100 characters for better processing
Configure MOCK_MODE=true for testing without API costs
Archive processed files regularly to maintain workspace organization
anti_patterns: Do not use this skill to scrape copyrighted content without permission
Avoid processing files with thousands of links at once
Do not rely on generated content without human review and editing
Avoid processing links behind login walls or paywalls

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: Only markdown files with .md extension are processed. Files are detected when dropped into the local_inputs directory.

faq.question: How many articles can I process at once?
faq.answer: The skill processes articles with a concurrency limit of 2. Processing large lists may take significant time.

faq.question: What happens to failed fetches?
faq.answer: Articles that fail to fetch are skipped. The skill logs the error and continues processing remaining articles.

faq.question: Can I use this without an Anthropic API key?
faq.answer: Yes, set MOCK_MODE=true in .env file. This generates mock output without calling the API.

faq.question: Where are results saved?
faq.answer: Generated posts are saved to outputs/defou-stanley-posts directory with timestamped filenames.

faq.question: What routing types are supported?
faq.answer: The AI applies T1 hot topics, T2 anti-chicken soup, T3 satire, or T4 dry goods templates based on content analysis.
